attributes.title: Test Youssou Chilli Sauce
attributes.description:
Created on February 24, 2010 by benzitohhh on Sourcemap.org:

First, the finest Dakarian Chillis are grown in the farm, sung to in person by Youssou N'Dour each morning. The chillis are then harvested and transported 500m by tractor to a production facility, where they are nuked in vinegar, oil and spices. Finally the sauce is packaged into bottles (manufactured and printed in China), and shipped direct to end customers, normally via airmail.
